alert.note: Alert for Cabell; Lincoln; Mason; Wayne (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 6:39PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Gallia, Mason, Cabell, northwestern Kanawha, Putnam, northern Lincoln, southwestern Jackson and northeastern Wayne Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 638 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of strong gusts ahead of a line of thunderstorms, extending from near Kenna to near Poca to Cross Lanes to St. Albans. Movement was west at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Nitro, Point Pleasant, Winfield, Hamlin, Jefferson, St. Albans, Dunbar, Hurricane, Barboursville, Milton, Eleanor, Buffalo, Poca, Ona, Culloden, Institute, Tornado, Cross Lanes, Kenna and Teays Valley. This includes the following highways... Interstate 77 in West Virginia between mile markers 128 and 135. Interstate 64 in West Virginia between mile markers 20 and 51. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
